education.description: Major in Machine Learning and AI. High level Master Degree with hands on projects. Teisa about predict mortality in 5 years by Deep learning algorithem with ECG , CT and data relations. some courses: NLP, Deep Learning , Machine Learning ect.

education.degree: B.Sc. - Industrial Engineering and information systems
education.description: Graduating with honors - 96 GPA. Awarded Rector's List achievements (four times). Final project - Development and implementation of BI system.

work.title: Full Stack Developer

Website development, automated processes and timings.Working on multiple software projects simultaneously and participating in the whole software development process from design to implementation and delivery. etermining areas for improvements by periodically monitoring the current system to boost efficiency.
 Knowledge and experience in Python, SQL, C#, Angular, CSS, DataStage (ETL).

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
